projects.html: 我的第一个Angular2组件，打印一些东西到屏幕(<b>'你好，世界'</ b>).

这个例子包括下面的对象:
- 使用事件绑定.
- 使用form和ngModel(指令双向绑定). - 使用css样式和html模板.
- 英雄列表（可以是任何东西的列表). > - 使用像 nFor 这样的打字机句子.
- 一个英雄的细节(或你需要的任何实体). - 具有ID和名称的英雄版本.
- 服务实现比从模拟数据获得列表和英雄的细节 来源(浏览器上没有任何数据库和所有数据). - 使用路由器参数化的类导航.
可以在下一个教程.

此示例与2相同.英雄之旅(17/10/2016).
不同之处在于使用Angular-Cli，用于生成项目，组件和构建.
Angular-Cli目前是第17个测试版，但感觉很有趣.

与Angular-Cli您可以: - 使用Cli项目结构生成您的项目. - 生成您的Web元素(组件，模块，服务，类等). - 构建项目和Angular-Cli仅生成必要的文件，用于识别环境模式(dev，prod等).该构建压缩了项目，并且您不需要依赖关系的node_modules地毯.
可以在下一个教程中使用angular-cli指令.

此示例与3相同.与Angular-Cli(18/10/2016)的英雄之旅.
这是实施版本，删除和搜索英雄(或任何你需要的实体). >你可以: - 在英雄的细节中编辑一个英雄. - 删除英雄列表中的英雄.
- 在信息中心搜索一个英雄.

你可以在下面的教程中做这个例子.

您必须扩展您想要的组件效果并实现html模板 和，淡入淡出，滚动，滚动，旋转，缩放和其他.

该项目是通过Angular-Cli开发的.

显示一个从具有祖先和孩子结构的json文件数据加载的树组件.
这棵树是使用app-tree-node组件，它自己调用.

当应用程序树节点被加载时，祖先被递归地加载和下一个孩子.

你 可以加载您想要的json文件，树将显示您选择的文件.

该项目灵感来自于我在java中使用xsl读取xml文件的树组件 几年前.

我想:我可以尝试在Angular2吗?

This project is developed with Angular-Cli.

Shows some divs components loaded from a json file data with title, content and styles.

These divs are draggable and droppable and you can use them with the app-div-node component.

This component is generated in the app-layout component with callback functions that make the events between divs.

This project shows the weather forecast of any municipality in Spain the next four days.

Use a configurable widget provided by AEMET.

You can search the municipality and click the button 'search'. The application will find the municipality and ask to AEMET for the weather forecast of the next 4 days and more details that are configurable.

If are you interested in this project, contact me to improve the product and make it commercial!

This example shows a 3D Scene with some cubes that you can picking them and they change the color and the camera is moved.

This example needs the gl-matrix.js and the litegl.js libraries for running.

This example shows a 3D Scene with a big cube and some cubes that you can picking them and they change the color.

You can rotate the camera dragging on the mouse in the scene.

This example shows a 3D Scene with some cubes that you can picking them and they change the color and the camera is moved.

The cubes are in X axe, when you pick one of them, this one is propagated on the Z axe, and occurs the same when you pick them in axe Y.

So the cubes are propagated on the three axes X, Y and Z.

This example needs the gl-matrix.js and the litegl.js libraries for running.

This is a comparative between AngularJS and Angular2 with the Google application Trends.

· Conclusions at October of 2016

- Angular2 began one year ago, but it's relevance doesn't arrive at 25% of AngularJS's relevance.
- Angular2 and AngularJS are mostly use in India.
- Angular2 only arrive in India, Canada, USA, Japan and Europe. The rest of the World doesn't know it.

· Conclusions at April of 2017

- Angular2 began two years ago, and continues growing. Now arrive at 30% of AngularJS's revelance.
- Angular2 and AngularJS are mostly use in India.
- Angular2 is growing in Europe (Germany, France Poland and Spain).

projects.titol: Unity与其他游戏引擎的比较
projects.html:
This is a comparative between Unity and the other Game Engine with the Google application Trends.

· Conclusions at October of 2016

- Unity is mostly use Game Engine.
- PlayStation4 and Xbox 360 are more relevant than Unity.
- Nvidia is equatable with Unity.
- In China, people are more interested in produce Games than in play them.
- PlayStation4 is the most used in USA, Canada, Australia and Europe.
- XBox 360 is most used in South America and Mexico.
- Nvidia is most used in Rusia.

· Conclusions at April of 2017

- The situation not change and is more or less the same.
- An important patern is repeated in the game's target people and them interests.
- On the December months the revelance of the the theme increase exponentially.

projects.titol: 比较Sketchup和其他3D建模计算机程序
projects.html:
This is a comparative between Sketchup and the other 3D modeling computer program with the Google application Trends.

· Conclusions at October of 2016

- Skechtup and Blender are the most relevant 3D modeling computer program in the last year.
- Sketchup is mostly used in South America and Australia and Blender in USA and Europe.
- 3d Studio Max and Maya are mostly used in Asia and India.
- Studying the evolution, we can see that 3d Studio Max and Maya were more important in the USA and in Europe ten years ago.
- In the last five years, Sketchup and Blender got more relevance, because these last ones are free.
- Considering that the USA and Europe are the future, Sketchtup and Blender are the 3D modeling computer program of the future as well.
- Like we saw in the comparative between Game Engines, XBox is mostly used were is mostly used Sketchup. And PlayStation4 is mostly used were is mostly used Blender.

· Conclusions at April of 2017

- The situation not change and is more or less the same.
- The revelance of Skechtup is growing respect Blender.
- An important patern is repeated in the game's target people and them interests.
- On the final of December months the revelance of the theme decrease exponentially. Perhaps is relationated with the exponential growing of the Game Trending Topics.

projects.titol: VR(虚拟现实)与PlayStation4和XBox 360游戏机之间的比较
projects.html:
This is a comparative between VR (Virtual Reality) and PlayStation4 and XBox 360 GameConsoles with the Google application Trends.

· Conclusions at December of 2016

- VR is growing in all the World in the last year.
- PlayStation4 and Xbox 360 are more relevant than VR.
- The growing of PlayStation4 and XBox 360 is influenced by VR.
- VR is more relevant in Europe, North America, Canada and Australia.

· Conclusions at April of 2017

- The situation is making tendencies.
- The tendence of Playstation 4 is growing.
- And the tendence of Xbox 360 and Virtual Reality are decreasing. Perhaps, Virtual Reality is a transient trend and XBox 360 have to change their Game Engine.

Objectives:

- This project aims to investigate and find out which subjects are of interest to the world.
- As the interests of the world are very wide, center the searches in regions with similar interests (I begin with Spain).
- And as interests vary over time, I will focus on the present.
- The Searches use the Google Trends Engine.

This Project is done in Java 8 with Spring Boot 1.5 and Angular 4 with Bootstrap 3.

I'm doing the architecture and thinking and designing the concepts.

For the moment, I've done:

An Spring Boot Unity Knowledge Rest Service saved in a MongoDB.

This are the Services Published:
  • POST Call adds a Robot in the mongoDB: You have to indicate the parameters required.
  • GET call returns the list of Robots saved in the mongoDB
  • POST Call adds a unity knowledge in the mongoDB: You have to indicate the parameters required.
  • GET call returns the list of Unities saved in the MongoDB

Working on it!

This Project is done in Java 8 with Spring Boot 1.5.

Is a Rest Service that call to an url to internet and response the content of the url.

You can call it with:
POST Call with array of tags by parameter
POST Call with a url parameter
POST Call with a url parameter and a tag parameter

You can call them with Postman App.
